item.description:
Price: $105.00 per person (no refunds)

How to find us: Meetup outside the Club House

What: Golf Lessons - 6 Tuesdays

When: Tuesday, May 8, 2012 @ 6:30 PM (instruction will begin @ 6:30)

Cost: $105 per person (5 wkly lessons & wk 6 live play) - unbelievable price!!

Where:

Rockland Golf Course
276 Plain Street
Rockland, MA 02370
781-878-5836

Who: No Guests for this meet-up as demand is high and space is limited


Hello Everyone -

Another year and more Golf Lessons! 2011 was a great group, wonderful turnout, learned a lot and had great fun!! Let's do it again for 2012!!

If you're new to the lessons this year - great! If you're joining us again - even better! Everyone is Welcome!!!  We maxed out participation last year in a "record" 48 hour period so you may want to sign up quickly & please be sure you can commit to the 6 week period with payment before RSVP'ing.  That way others are not shut out - thanks

The lessons will be with our crack Golf Pro Team at Rockland Golf Course.  We will have 3 dedicated Golf Pro's instruct us whereby the group will be split into skill levels and instructed accordingly.  Each week we'll rotate between instructors with instruction from each at a Beginner to Intermediate level.

  • Tentative Lesson Plan:
    • Week #1 - Putting, Chipping, Grip
    • Week #2 - Pitching, short game
    • Week #3 - Working with Irons
    • Week #4 - Woods, driving, T off
    • Week #5 - Live play on the course with instruction
    • Week #6 - Live play with group discounted greeens fee ($5's included)

PAYMENT:

In order to be included you must commit to the 6 weeks.  There are NO refunds and payment is expected up front.  Prior to the start date I will email you the payment information and where to make your $105 payment.

NOTE:

  • If you RSVP to the clinic you are committing to the entire 6 weeks of classes or $105’s
  • If you have an absence during the clinic, unfortunately, I cannot refund for the week missed
  • Plan to arrive a few minutes early to get organized and into groups as the lesson will begin promptly at 6:30 pm
  • Golf clubs and balls will be supplied to any member if needed at no charge 
  • SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.


Organizers: Susan (AO)

The Final Deadline is Noon, Tuesday, May 1st for RSVP & Payment. Please be mindful if you change your RSVP to NO at the last minute as you may be taking a spot away from someone else that is serious about participating.

Weather Alternative:

None.  This event will be canceled if it is raining or too foggy. I will send an email to cancel that afternoon or the night before. So check your email if the weather seems questionable. However, we cannot control Mother Nature so we will do our best to notify everyone at least 3 hours prior to the event. Please do not assume a cancellation unless you recieve an email saying so.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 2012 Golf Lessons
